Introduction

Lee Donghwa is a South Korean singer under JYP Entertainment. He is best known as a member of the boy group KickFlip.

In January 5, 2025, Donghwa was revealed as the 3rd member of KickFlip. He officially debuted with the group's first single album "Umm Great".
